messages.subject: new to unschooling approach
messages.msgSnippet: Consider two things: Valerie Fitzenreiter s new book, The Unprocessed Child, Oh yes!! I just got my copy today, OK, OK, it s not really MY copy, it s for the
messages.messageBody:
"Consider two things:

Valerie Fitzenreiter's new book, The Unprocessed Child,"

Oh yes!! I just got my copy today, OK, OK, it's not really MY copy, it's for the LIFE Funfest in September.
The front says: " The Unprocessed Child is not so much a book about how to raise our children without school, but a book aout respect, dignity and honor of the very nature of childhood" Tracy Simmons

Very cool!

Ren
